payload:
## Usage 

 Click on the navigation tree to open the docs

scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.format: npm run format:eslint && npm run format:prettier

{"description":"Tab navigation for the open panels in a panel-coordinator.


```html
 <!-- inject the tabs from panelCoordinator and connect the keyboard navigation -->
 <furo-panel-coordinator-tabs ƒ-inject-tabs="--panelChanges" ƒ-trigger-navigation="--navpadPanelTabs" >
   <!-- add keyboard navigation -->
   <furo-navigation-pad @-navigated="--navpadPanelTabs"></furo-navigation-pad>
 </furo-panel-coordinator-tabs>
 <furo-pages flex default="default">
   <furo-panel-coordinator ƒ-show-page="--nodeSelected"  @-panels-changed="--panelChanges"></furo-panel-coordinator>
```","summary":"tab navigation for panel-coordinator","path":"src/furo-panel-coordinator-tabs.js","properties":[{"name":"tabindex","type":"number | null | undefined","description":"Sets the tabindex","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":214,"column":6},"end":{"line":214,"column":45}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"attributeType":"Number"}}},{"name":"focused","type":"boolean | null | undefined","description":"indicates that the element is focused","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":218,"column":6},"end":{"line":218,"column":45}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"attributeType":"Boolean"}}}],"methods":[{"name":"triggerNavigation","description":"Connect your navigation pad.

Default mappings are:
- Enter => selectFocused
- ArroLeft => focusPrevious
- ArroRight => focusNext
- Home => focusFirst
- End => focusLast
- Escape => closeFocused

To disable a function, just add the `ignored-keys` to furo-navigation-tabs.","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":64,"column":2},"end":{"line":102,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"key"}],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"closeFocused","description":"Closes the focused tab.","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":109,"column":2},"end":{"line":123,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"focusNext","description":"Focuses the next tab.
